scripts.ios:beta: npm run test && npm run version:ios && cd ios && bundle exec fastlane beta
scripts.android:alpha: npm run test && npm run version:android && cd android && bundle exec fastlane alpha
scripts.android:beta: npm run test && npm run version:android && cd android && bundle exec fastlane beta
scripts.version:ios: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane version version:$npm_package_version
scripts.version:android: cd android && bundle exec fastlane version version:$npm_package_version
scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && yarn && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-*

ios.sim.debug.iPhone7.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.iPhone7.name: iPhone 7

ios.sim.release.iPhone7.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.iPhone7.name: iPhone 7

ios.sim.debug.iPhoneX.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.iPhoneX.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.iPhoneX.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.iPhoneX.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.debug.iPhone5s.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.iPhone5s.name: iPhone 5s

ios.sim.release.iPhone5s.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.iPhone5s.name: iPhone 5s

ios.sim.debug.iPhoneSE.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.iPhoneSE.name: iPhone SE

ios.sim.release.iPhoneSE.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/Monica.xcworkspace -scheme Monica -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.iPhoneSE.name: iPhone SE
